level.heading: High call volume protocol.
level.text: ยง 23-302 High call volume protocol. a. No later than September 30, 2011, the 311 customer service center shall implement a protocol for responding to high call volume. Such protocol shall include, but not be limited to, (i) a system to efficiently and effectively answer, direct and track all calls; (ii) increased utilization of automated telephone messages, short message services, social media, email alerts, and the city's website to disseminate information and to reduce non-critical information requests; and (iii) a plan to ensure adequate staffing both in anticipation of, and in response to, high call volume incidents. b. A copy of such protocol shall be provided to the council.
